description: Draft the ConOps from the solution-concept upstream

description: Draft an ADR for the GUI framework decision
prompt: Use the docforge-drafter skill. I want to draft an ADR for the GUI framework decision (Electron vs local-first web app). Create it as docs/architectural/adrs/ADR-0001-gui-framework.md.
expectations: Context section explains why this decision matters
At least two alternatives are evaluated with trade-offs
Consequences section covers both positive and negative outcomes
